white.line: If you chanced to be passing down that Moonstone street and saw that alert white figure rocking there behind the screen of roses and lingering late into the night, you might feel sorry for her, and how mistaken you would be!
Tillie finished brushing her white hair and laughed as she gave it a smart turn and brought it into her usual French twist.

black.line: If Moonstone doubted, she had evidence enough: in black and white, in figures and photographs, evidence in hair lines on metal disks.

purple.line: The cat was purring on the bench and the morning-glories were thrusting their purple trumpets in through the lattice-work in a friendly way.

red.line: The front porch, to be sure, was dripping with crimson ramblers that ought to be cut for the good of the vines; but never the rose in the hand for Tillie!

pink.line: The front porch, to be sure, was dripping with crimson ramblers that ought to be cut for the good of the vines; but never the rose in the hand for Tillie!
